meanings.sent1: The sailors coanchoring the ship worked as a team.
meanings.sent2: They coanchored the boat securely to the dock.
meanings.sent3: The friends coanchoring their tents for the camping trip laughed as they struggled to coordinate.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like coanchoring, keeping them steady through life's storms.
meanings.sent5: The image of coanchoring ships in the harbor stayed with him, symbolizing unity and strength.

meanings.sent1: The coanchoring of the two boats was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: We relied on the coanchoring of our efforts to achieve success.
meanings.sent3: The coanchoring of the flags in the wind created a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: In their relationship, coanchoring was the foundation of their bond.
meanings.sent5: The concept of coanchoring in teamwork was emphasized during the training session.
